name: boundary-boundary
author: boundary
summary: Boundary meter module and event report handler

providers.name: default
providers.doc: This is a default provider that does nothing. This allows us to install the Boundary meter on the same puppet run where we want to use it.

properties.name: ensure
properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.

description: A module to install Boundary meters and report to event handler.
